name: RunningSum
description: Running sum over a window. Calculates a running sum over the last N samples.

inputs.name: numsamp
inputs.description: Number of samples in the running sum window

name: RunningMin
description: Running minimum over a window. Tracks the minimum value over the last N samples.

inputs.name: numsamp
inputs.description: Number of samples in the window

name: RunningMax
description: Running maximum over a window. Tracks the maximum value over the last N samples.

inputs.name: numsamp
inputs.description: Number of samples in the window

name: PeakFollower
description: Peak tracking envelope follower. Follows the peak amplitude of a signal.

inputs.name: decay
inputs.description: Decay coefficient per sample (0 to 1). Values close to 1 = slower decay

name: Slope
description: Measures the rate of change (slope/derivative) of a signal per sample.

name: ZeroCrossing
description: Zero crossing frequency. Estimates frequency by counting zero crossings.

name: Pitch
description: Pitch tracking and analysis. Autocorrelation-based pitch detector.

inputs.name: minFreq
inputs.description: Minimum frequency to detect in Hz

inputs.name: maxFreq
inputs.description: Maximum frequency to detect in Hz
